message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's important to settle this quickly because the value of the money decreases with each round.

I think we can do better. Let's split it 60/40 with me getting the bigger share. This way, we both get more than what was offered in the previous round, and we can avoid any further depreciation in value.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere fast. My offer is now $55 for me and $45 for you.  Let's settle this before the money shrinks even further!
